required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: HAFAI Cohort 5 Year Follow up of Patients With Femoroacetabular Impingement Undergoing Hip Arthroscopy
clinical_study.official_title: Pain, Function and Hip Osteoarthritis 5 Years After Hip Arthroscopic Surgery in Patients With Femoroacetabular Impingement

brief_summary.textblock: Patients included in the HAFAI cohort will be invited for 5 year follow up.

detailed_description.textblock: Patients with femoroacetabular impingement will be investigated 5 years after surgery. We will used the Copenhagen Hip and Groin Score to evaluate pain, activities of daily living, sport, participation in sport and hip-related quality of life. Furthermore, degree of hip osteoarthritis will be evaluated using standing x-rays. Last, we will investigate number of re-operations and conversions to total hip replacement.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Score at 5 years and change from before surgery to 5 years after surgery
primary_outcome.description: Pain 5 years after surgery measured with the Copenhagen hip and groin scale (0-100 score)

primary_outcome.time_frame: Score at 5 years and change from before surgery to 5 years after surgery
primary_outcome.description: Sports function 5 years after surgery measured with the Copenhagen hip and groin scale (0-100 score)

primary_outcome.measure: Development of osteoarthritis 5 years after surgery
primary_outcome.time_frame: Score at 5 years and change from before surgery to 5 years after surgery
primary_outcome.description: Lateral hip joint space width measured at anterior posterior standing radiographs

primary_outcome.time_frame: From date of initial surgery until the date of first documented re-operation or total hip replacement, whichever came first, assessed up to 6 years after initial surgery

secondary_outcome.measure: Activities of daily living 5 years after surgery
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Score at 5 years and change from before surgery to 5 years after surgery
secondary_outcome.description: Activities of daily living 5 years after surgery measured with the Copenhagen hip and groin scale (0-100 score)

secondary_outcome.measure: Hip related quality of life 5 years after surgery
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Score at 5 years and change from before surgery to 5 years after surgery
secondary_outcome.description: Hip related quality of life 5 years after surgery measured with the Copenhagen hip and groin scale (0-100 score)

secondary_outcome.measure: Participation in sport 5 years after surgery (HAGOS)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Score at 5 years and change from before surgery to 5 years after surgery
secondary_outcome.description: Participation in sport 5 years after surgery measured with the Copenhagen hip and groin scale (0-100 score)

secondary_outcome.measure: Participation in sport 5 years after surgery (HSAS)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Score at 5 years and change from before surgery to 5 years after surgery
secondary_outcome.description: Participation in sport 5 years after surgery measured with Hip Sports activity scale

intervention.description: Patients that had hip arthroscopic surgery 5 years ago will be invited for 5 year follow up. The surgical procedures consisted of femoral osteoplasty, labral refixation and acetabular osteoplasty

study_pop.textblock: Patients included in the HAFAI cohort 5 years ago.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Included in the HAFAI cohort
Exclusion Criteria:
- Non
